text: ya 'ayuha alnabiu qul liman asrtmwhm fi "bdr": la tasawa ealaa alfda' aldhy 'akhadh mnkm, 'iin yaelam allah taealaa fi qulubikum khyrana yutikum khyrana mimaa 'ukhdh minkum min almal bi'ana yuyassir lakum min fadlih khyrana kthyrana -wqd 'unjiz allah waedah llebas radi allah eanh wghyrh-, wayaghfir lakum dhnwbkm. wallah subhanah ghafur ldhnwb eibadih 'iidha tabu, rahim bhm
